meanings.definition: The joint connecting the foot with the leg.
meanings.sent1: She twisted her ankle while playing soccer.
meanings.sent2: He wore socks that covered his ankle.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky squirrel hid the acorn in the ankle of the tree.
meanings.sent4: The ankle of the river flowed gently through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The anklet adorned her ankle with delicate charms.

meanings.sent1: The tired hiker began to ankle along the rocky path.
meanings.sent2: The toddler learned to ankle across the room.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to ankle gracefully on the ice but slipped comically.
meanings.sent4: She had to ankle through the crowd to reach the stage.
meanings.sent5: The old dog continued to ankle around the yard despite his age.
